docs.text: Welcome to my MDEF journey 👋🏻 Hey, this is Beste Welcome to my journey through the Master in Design for Emergent Futures at IAAC , Elisava and Fab Lab Barcelona . Join me in this process, more is yet to come! Your browser does not support the video tag.
docs.title: Home

docs.text: About ¶ I completed my Bachelor’s in Communication and Design, where I worked on my creative skills and developed a strong visual sensibility. Over the course of my career, I’ve explored the intersection of multiple creative fields, blending photography, videography, and motion design to craft compelling stories. I am now expanding my perspective and approach, eager to push the boundaries of design and explore new ways of thinking. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit my website
docs.title: Beste
